ygData.msgSnippet: Traveling alone, though? What about all the bots we killed together? What about all of the times we took shots for each other? It s horribly not fair. I wish

"Traveling alone, though? What about all the bots we killed together? What =
about all of the times we took shots for each other? It's horribly not fair=
. I wish I had a partner still." Sinesis said. He looked closer at Twister.=


"Hey, will you be my partner?" Sinesis askes Twister...
  ----- Original =
Message ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: F=
riday, August 04, 2000 4:38 AM
  Subject: Re: NBW


  Twister/Blizzard/Infe=
ctra



  *Twister looks at the sword and sighs*

  Twister: I'll have to g=
et used to the fact that, my sister has a life too and I'll have to learn t=
o travel alone....

  *Twister sighs and slowly and gentley places the ener=
gon eagles into her arm compartment*


  *Blizzard looks at Sinister and sm=
iles*

  Blizzard: I wonder what's happening back at the base.



  *Infect=
ra smiles back at Airbomber*

  Infectra: I trust the both of you......I di=
d trust the others but....

  *Infectra sighs*

  Infectra: I need to stop =
thinking of things that upset me. But, it's hard to thinl of the good times=
 because there were hardly none.

  *Infectra says to Airbomber and grins*
=


    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@egrou=
ps.com 
    Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 4:20 AM
    Subject: Re: NBW


  =
  Sinesis frowns. He holds up his brothers sword.

    "He left this here, =
without it, what shall he do? We have simular problems. I just wish I still=
 had him by my side." Sinesis said to Twister.

    Sinister held Blizzards=
 hand, illegal fireworks shooting off in his eyes.

    Stranato calls out.=


    "Hey, any Maximals here?" He yells through the base. Airbomber sits d=
own and looks to Infectra. He smiles.

    "Hopefully, the Maximals will li=
sten to us, they must know of the occurences happening. I trust Stranato, h=
e's always been good. Well, maybe he hasn't always been good, but he's good=
 now." Airbomber said to Infectra. He laughed at his words...
      ----- O=
riginal Message ----- 
      From: ilovealllizards 
      To: nbwrpg@egroup=
s.com 
      Sent: Thursday, August 03, 2000 11:44 PM
      Subject: Re: NB=
W


      Twister/Blizzard/Infectra



      *Twister looks at Sinesis*

  =
    Twister: I've decided to let my sister be...For she's my sister and I l=
ove her too much to pull her away from the she loves....

      *Twister op=
ens her arm compartment and pulls out a two small pieces of energon both sh=
aped like an eagle*

      Twister: Our parents gave us both one to unite u=
s as sisters and friends forever and always help each other. I found Blizza=
rd's on the ground in front of the base. I doubt she dropped it by accident=
.....

      *Twister holds out to Sinesis so he can see*



      (OOC: Ac=
k! I meant The Team Ultima Base! My bad, Sorry.)

      *Blizzard skips out=
 of the cave and walks next to Sinister for The Team Ultima Base and holds =
her hand out wanting Sinister to hold her hand*



      *Infectra follows =
Stranato and Airbomber into the Maximal Base*


        ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
        From: THECODE 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        S=
ent: Thursday, August 03, 2000 6:59 PM
        Subject: Re: NBW


        S=
inesis sighs and stares at Twister. (Sorry about earlier.)

        Siniste=
r frowns when he sees Blizar walking toward the Maximal base.

        "Whe=
re are you going? And can I come?" Sinister asked.

        Stranato and Ai=
rbomber stop at the Maximal base, since they were never set on enemy and ne=
ver betrayed the Maximals, they went on in...
          ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
          From: ilovealllizards 
          To: nbwrpg@...=
m 
          Sent: Thursday, August 03, 2000 6:46 PM
          Subject: Re:=
 NBW


          Infectra/Wrath/Blizzard/Twister


          *Infectra foll=
ows Stranato and Airbomber towards the Maximal Base*



          *Wrath ge=
ts into a CR Chamber when he arives at the Maximal Base awaits his repairs*=




          *Blizzard does a little skip out of the cave walks next to Si=
nister for the Maximal Base and holds her hand out towards his wanting to h=
old hands with him*



          (OOC: Twister is out near the Maximal Base=
 but I'm making her come back anyway.)

          *Twister leaves the locat=
ion of the Maximal Base seeing as how everyone was else where and went back=
 to Team Ultimas Base and sits at the same table as Sinesis*

          Twi=
ster: I don't know what I'm going to do....I end up here thinking I'll find=
 a nice Team where I'm wanted and me and my sister could be sisters and fri=
ends...I was such a fool for believing such happiness could happen.....

  =
        *Twister puts her double sided sword away stares at the table*


  =
          ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: THECODE 
        =
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Thursday, August 03, 2000 6:2=
7 PM
            Subject: NBW


            Stranato and Airbomber walked t=
oward the Maximal base.

            Gangon, still dying.

            Deem=
os and Inzola confront one another several times, but Inzola always runs fr=
om Deemos.

            Etchingar called out to Megatron.

            "Hey=
, do I got the job?" He asked.

            Time Bomb waited patiently and =
Land Mine was healed now. Land Mine looked around, looking to meet Megatron=
.

            Sinister came out of the cave (Hopefully with Blizzard.) and=
 started back toward Team Ultima's base.

            Sinesis was healed an=
d sat down next to Twister...
